thread.title: kevin

author: kevin
title: kevin
text: Having received an email stating the latest offers I headed to the website added numerous items to the basket of sufficient value to warrant the free offer and 3 for £30, This didnt show up in the basket so I made the purchase to find the 3 for £30 wasnt valid. Having sent an email, the reply which stated that because I had logged in was not entitled to other offers. This was not clearly stated, apart from the small print in the T&C. A little disappointing.
